description:
Keroro becomes a hulking super-frog in order to intimidate Natsumi. Later, when Keroro becomes the victim of a phone scam, Kululu creates an analog phone robot to help track down the culprit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, The Incredible Keroro / Keroro, Black-Phone Investigator 66
ケロロ 超人ケロロ であります / ケロロ 黒電話捜査官66 であります
